# covid19mx

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of covid19mx is to provide a dashboard to visualise covid-19 data for Mexico.

You can check the dashboard [here](https://davidmateos.shinyapps.io/covid19mx/).

Updated: 06/04/2020

Please note that the 'covid19mx' project is released with a [Contributor Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md).
